Class Stat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pathfindersdk.stats.Stat
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbilityScore, AbilityStat, Size, Skill

    public class Stat
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a generic character stat (ex: Initiative, AC, etc.).
